tweet: Today, Minnesota Dept. of Natural Resources (DNR) issued permit for construction of comprehensive #floodprotection in Red River Valley. The permit advances Route B & will give certainty & security to residents & businesses in #Fargo-Moorhead region:  http://bit.ly/2QXpDVL  pic.twitter.com/dcbK2lKTLw

We can and should fund the government and secure our borders. I voted to proceed to House-passed CR with $5.7b for border security & disaster assist funds. It is only reasonable that we pass our approps bills, keep the gov open and provide funding for the wall & border security.

I joined the President today as he signed the 2018 #FarmBill. Joining me were @RepKevinCramer;  Kevin Skunes, president of @NationalCorn & @NDagriculture Commissioner Doug Goehring. pic.twitter.com/IgP8CRhKuN
I’m joining the President at a signing ceremony for the 2018 #FarmBill. Watch here: https://youtu.be/lApsWC5JSgE

Additionally, as chairman of the Agriculture Appropriations Committee, I worked to pass a strong Fiscal Year 2019 Agriculture Appropriations Bill through the Senate. We need to pass this bill and the remaining other six appropriations bills through regular order.
I support the president’s efforts to secure the border and will continue working to provide him with the funding and authority necessary to ensure we have strong border security.

I did not support the continuing resolution because it does not include the funding necessary to secure the border and build the wall, but the legislation was approved by voice vote. The American people want border security, but democrats continue to block funding for it.
The 2018 #FarmBill maintains strong land-grant research funding & includes increased funding for other USDA research programs. pic.twitter.com/YyoG1qFiX0

Latest @uscensusbureau estimates show #NorthDakota’s population has reached an all-time high. North Dakota continues to demonstrate how essential a strong economy is to growing our state & its communities.

The 2018 #FarmBill supports #agriculture trade by consolidating & providing strong funding for the Market Access, Foreign Market Development, Technical Assistance for Specialty Crops & the Emerging Market Programs. pic.twitter.com/90Q3BMAxGH

The 2018 #FarmBill includes a modified version of my Capital for #Farmers & #Ranchers Act, increasing FSA Guaranteed Operation & Ownership Loans to $1.75 million, Direct Operating Loans to $400,000 & Direct Ownership Loans to $600,000. pic.twitter.com/GECrVyMpu8

BIG NEWS: @USDA launched 2nd round of trade assistance for #farmers & #ranchers. Although recent progress has been made, times are tough in farm country. Trade assistance & the #FarmBill provide much-needed certainty for our #agriculture producers as trade negotiations continue.
POTUS signed into law my legislation (S. 440 and S. 2074) enabling homeowners around Patterson Lake & the #Jamestown Reservoir to purchase their lots: http://bit.ly/2LmzL46

Cannon Ball Elementary & #Solen HS were recently recognized for their students’ academic achievements. These schools are using innovative methods to help kids learn & achieve academic success. We’re grateful for their work. Congrats to the admins, teachers & students.

The 2018 #FarmBill maintains the full suite of voluntary conservation programs like EQIP. The bill DOES NOT authorize permanent easements, a proposal I opposed because it would have infringed on individual property rights. pic.twitter.com/oXsi9QSH3d

The 2018 #FarmBill makes changes to the conservation title to make it more #farmer-friendly. We included my provisions to improve the NRCS wetlands appeals process & require a report on the no. of small wetlands in #NorthDakota, SD & Iowa. pic.twitter.com/xEG0EtxEQn

This week we passed a strong 5-year #FarmBill that gives our #farmers & #ranchers the tools they need to succeed. I included many provisions in the bill which are priorities for #NorthDakota, & I outlined these to #ag producers at @NDFarmersUnion annual convention today. pic.twitter.com/XwNZrJlZzB

Thank you to the many volunteers gathering at @ArlingtonNatl & more than 1,400 locations across the U.S. & world today to lay wreaths in commemoration of the sacrifice & service of our nation’s #veterans. #WreathsAcrossAmericaDay

Joining @NDFarmersUnion at their annual convention in #Bismarck this afternoon to outline provisions we secured in the #FarmBill for #NorthDakota producers. I’ll also be highlighting work to advance 2nd half of USDA’s trade assistance to help our #agriculture producers.
The 2018 #FarmBill maintains strong sugar policy to ensure our sugar producers have a level playing field in the world market. pic.twitter.com/b8trsj5gHP

I encouraged POTUS to take immediate action to advance construction of Keystone XL Pipeline in letter w/ @SteveDaines & 42 Senators & Representatives. The pipeline will upgrade important energy infrastructure to support our economy & create jobs:  http://bit.ly/2GgpzLv  pic.twitter.com/QG07U8nuZD

Encouraged to see China starting to buy soybeans from U.S. producers. At the same time, I called OMB Dir. Mulvaney this week & emphasized importance of USDA continuing w/ trade assistance to impacted producers. http://bit.ly/2QAUtTX

We have the highest quality, lowest cost food supply thanks to hard work of our #farmers & ranchers. That’s why as a #FarmBill conf. committee member I worked to ensure that the final farm bill gives producers tools they need to succeed. More in @inforum: http://bit.ly/2CdlpA1
New @fargovahcs clinic opening in #Minot today - Southside Plaza, 3400 S Broadway - an updated & valuable resource for area #veterans.

The 2018 #FarmBill improves #Agriculture Risk Coverage (ARC) & Price Loss Coverage (PLC) programs & maintains ARC Individual. Specifically, the bill includes my proposal to reduce ARC disparities from county to county, making payments fairer. pic.twitter.com/nYFjYA2BMq

.@SecretarySonny today launched @USDA pilot program for rural e-connectivity. I worked as Senate #Ag Approps chair to secure strong funding to spur rural broadband investment. This program will be important tool in helping connect #farmers, #ranchers & folks living in rural areas pic.twitter.com/wyz2jSh4Dg

Members of our @NDNationalGuard are always ready to serve #NorthDakota & our nation. We join w/ them today in celebrating the @USNationalGuard’s birthday. #NationalGuardBDay pic.twitter.com/jAzcsJ0LuE
The 2018 #FarmBill maintains strong crop insurance, one of my top priorities because it’s the primary risk management tool for many #agriculture producers. pic.twitter.com/bhy4HupOen

.@FCC voted unanimously today to ensure sufficient & predictable support for rural broadband providers. As Senate #Ag Approps chairman, I worked to help spur investment in rural broadband, & this decision furthers efforts to provide broadband to those living in rural areas.

BIG NEWS: The House just approved 2018 #FarmBill, sending it to POTUS to be signed into law. The Senate approved the measure yesterday by a vote of 87-13. The farm bill is important for #farmers, #ranchers & every American. http://bit.ly/2SHDnA7

Yesterday held a lot of good news for #NorthDakota #farmers & #ranchers as the Senate passed the #FarmBill & also @EPA & @USACEHQ announced new regulatory relief under WOTUS rule. I joined officials at announcement. More in @MinotDailyNews: http://bit.ly/2PvC71b

Good farm policy benefits every American, every day. We took a big step in passing #FarmBill in same year previous one expired – 1st time since 1990 – as the Senate passed conf. committee’s report. Bill includes many #NorthDakota priorities, more here: http://bit.ly/2EsjOJh

BREAKING NEWS - Senate has passed final #FarmBill w/ strong bipartisan support. This is good news for our #farmers & #ranchers who produce the highest quality, lowest cost food in the world. Now the bill goes to the House for final passage.  http://bit.ly/2EsjOJh  pic.twitter.com/CfkN9oMEpc

Great event at @EPA today where I helped announce new regulatory relief under WOTUS rule which will help restore regulatory primacy for states & tribes, & provide certainty including for our #farmers & #ranchers.

More here:  http://bit.ly/2LaVLyV  pic.twitter.com/PhPoMFiDIR

I don’t care how many times I have to say it, good farm policy benefits every American, every day. Now that we’ve signed the #FarmBill18 conference report, we’re very near the finish line. I’m committed to passing the #FarmBill before the end of the year.  http://bit.ly/2BcrCKQ  pic.twitter.com/sDys3Pjwf8

We worked hard on #FarmBill conf. committee to find agreement on the 2018 Farm Bill & now we need to pass it through Congress ASAP. This long-term farm bill provides producers w/ certainty & tools they need to succeed now & in the coming years.  http://bit.ly/2BcrCKQ  pic.twitter.com/4Qn9e63KXm

The #FarmBill conf. committee has released conf. report. Our #farmers & #ranchers need certainty that comes w/ passage of a 5 yr. farm bill. Good farm policy benefits every American, every day & we need to pass this farm bill before year end. http://bit.ly/2BcrCKQ

Just signed 2018 #FarmBill conference report. This is an important step in advancing this legislation which strengthens farm safety net & provides important tools to help see #NorthDakota #farmers & #ranchers through hard times. pic.twitter.com/kZzLB6BrLj
Best wishes to all attending #NDASC18 in #Bismarck - gathering of student leaders from throughout #NorthDakota. Thanks to all who bring this event together.

Senate passed bill I cosponsored (S.2343) requiring @FCC to identify gaps in availability of broadband service on farm land. Filling in these gaps will help our #farmers use precision #agriculture to efficiently do their work. pic.twitter.com/Kpp8dpwzdN

Nearly 3 years ago, we lifted a decades-long ban on exporting crude oil. This has helped grow our economy & create jobs while keeping gas prices low & making our nation more secure. For first time on record, U.S. exported more oil than we imported:  http://reut.rs/2QgbAde

We appreciate @SecretarySonny for publishing a final rule to provide flexibility for federal child nutrition programs. We’ve worked w/ @USDA & groups like @NSBAComm & @SchoolLunch to empower local school districts. This rule will help schools serve nutritious & appetizing food.
